page.title: 08Industrial Estate,Lurgan
page.content: The Industrial Estate is situated at Annesborough on the outskirts of Lurgan.It was opened in 1973 as part of the development of the new city of Craigavon. It has 49 different units offering accommodation for businesses requiring areas ranging from a very spacious factory down to a small warehouse. The Estate is built close to the Motorway Roundabout,which gives the tenants easy access to the rest of the country and to the harbours at Larne, Belfast and Warrenpoint.There is also a very good road to Belfast Airport. Some tenants,especially those requiring the smaller units,only stay for a short time.There are,therefore, frequent changes in the type of work being done on the Estate.
